title: University of Bordeaux Interactive Map
help-map-text:
You can navigate the map with a mouse, keyboard, or touchscreen.
To zoom in / out, use the + / - buttons or the mouse wheel. A search bar at the top right corner of the map allows you to search for streets or buildings in the campus.
help-geolocation-text: Use the geolocation button below the zoom buttons to locate yourself on the campus.
help-directions-text:
Right-click on the map to place your origin or destination point. You can use the directions menu that opens to change your starting or ending points or to add more steps.
Press the red button at the bottom left corner to close the directions menu.
help-marker-text: Right-click on the map to select a location. Press "Add marker" to open a form. Fill out the form with the marker's category, its time limit, and a descriptive text.
help-filter-text: A button at the bottom left corner of the map lets you filter the markers displayed by category.
